data.title: Kevin Smith Fondly Remembers ‘Clerks’ Star Lisa Spoonauer, Who Has Passed Away
meta_keywords: Kevin Smith Fondly Remembers 'Clerks' Star Lisa Spoonauer After Her Passing
who played Caitlin Bree in Kevin Smith's Clerks
has passed away. She was only 44. Her cause of death is unknown. Spoonauer worked as an actress only briefly -- appearing in Clerks and one other film
data.meta_description: Lisa Spoonauer, who played Caitlin Bree in Kevin Smith's Clerks, has passed away. She was only 44. Her cause of death is unknown. Spoonauer worked as an actress only briefly -- appearing in Clerks and one other film, Bachelor --...
data.text:
Lisa Spoonauer, who played Caitlin Bree in Kevin Smith’s Clerks, has passed away. She was only 44. Her cause of death is unknown.

Spoonauer worked as an actress only briefly — appearing in Clerks and one other film, Bachelor — and was also briefly married to her Clerks co-star, Jeff Anderson. As Caitlin Bree in Clerks, she famously had sex with a corpse in a dark bathroom.

Brian O’Halloran, who played Dante in Clerks, expressed his grief on Instagram, saying he was “gutted by the news.”

Kevin Smith also offered a tribute to the late actress, saying that — during the audition process — “she didn’t sound like she was acting at all; she delivered scripted dialogue as if she was inventing her conversation in the moment, like people do in real life. “
